hero.title: Reconnect with Your Roots. Celebrate Your Heritage.
hero.subTitle: An interactive platform to help African diaspora families explore their history, preserve cultural traditions, and collaborate across generations.

sectionTwo.title: Your family’s story, visualized and preserved for generations to come.

features.title: Bridging Generations, Preserving Culture
features.subTitle: Discover a unique platform built for African diaspora families to.

familyTree.title: Family Tree Visualization
familyTree.option1: Create family tree to map relationships, add photos and document family stories.
familyTree.option2: Invite family members to collaborate, edit, and grow the tree together.

culturalHeritage.title: Cultural Heritage Hub
culturalHeritage.option1: Upload and share stories, traditions, and recipes unique to your family and heritage.
culturalHeritage.option2: Choose to keep content private for your family or share it with a wider community.

migrationTracking.title: Migration History Tracking
migrationTracking.option1: Document your family’s migration journey with a timeline.
migrationTracking.option2: Visualize routes and milestones using an interactive map.

steps.stepOne: Sign Up: Create an account and invite family members.
steps.stepTwo: Build Your Tree: Start mapping relationships, adding photos, and recording stories.
steps.stepThree: Share and Collaborate: Work with family members to enrich your heritage archive.

feedbackOne.description: This platform brought my family closer than ever. Seeing our migration journey on a timeline was powerful!

feedbackTwo.description: Sharing recipes from my grandmother with my cousins abroad has been such a joy. This tool makes preserving culture easy!

feedbackThree.description: This is an amazing platform. Compared to other platforms, this one stands out for its innovative features. It's clear that the makers put a lot of thought into creating a solution that truly addresses user needs.

heritage.title: Your Heritage, Your Story
heritage.subTitle: Don’t let your family’s history fade. Join a growing community of families documenting and celebrating their heritage.
